channel.title: PC Magazine: New Product Reviews
channel.description: First looks at new products from PC Magazine: lab-based test, ratings, editor and user reviews.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2004 Ziff Davis Media Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Search and Recover 2
item.description: Search and Recover 2 is a nicely balanced file-recovery utility that excels in recovering lost pictures, videos, and sound files.

item.title: ADV: Win an Epson L-410 Digital Camera and Energizer Compact Charger!
item.description: Energizer brings you it’s Hi-Charge Sweepstakes with your chance to win an Epson Digital Camera and Compact Charger with AA 2500 batteries, the hardest working Energizer rechargeable battery ever, so you never miss a shot.

item.title: HP Color LaserJet 5550dtn
item.description: The HP Color LaserJet 5550dtn offers reasonably fast speed and good to excellent quality.

item.title: Microsoft Optical Desktop with Fingerprint Reader
item.description: If you find your office littered with Post-It notes scribbled with username and password combinations, you should seriously consider increasing your security, and this keyboard and mouse combo will certainly give you a boost in the right direction.

item.title: BusinessWorks Gold 5.0
item.description: BusinessWorks Gold is easily capable of maintaining complex business books for companies that have outgrown small business software, but its unfortunate interface and navigational tools are mired in the 1990s.

item.title: Alohabob PC Backup 6.0.9.10
item.description: Alohabob PC Backup is a smart choice for those who want to guarantee data safety with a minimum amount of hassle.

item.title: Keyhole 2 Pro
item.description: With its excellent animation and a huge database of geographical information covering the whole world, Keyhole 2 Pro offers a compelling service that lets you access a wide variety of topographical and related economic data.

item.title: Virgin Player
item.description: The Virgin player is plenty of player for your money. It doesn't unseat the iPod Mini, but it's certainly a contender.

item.title: iRiver H320
item.description: The iRiver H320 is a no-compromises player that sounds terrific and records beautifully.

item.title: Creative Zen Micro
item.description: The Zen Micro is the first small player to offer a serious challenge to the iPod Mini.

item.title: palmOne Treo 650
item.description: If your business currently supports Treo 600s or other palmOne PDAs for your mobile workforce, or if you finally are giving in and buying a smartphone, the Treo 650 is a compelling upgrade that makes it a must buy for all but the most bleeding-edge power users.

item.title: ADV: Sign up for Dell e-mail updates today!
item.description: Dell Small Business invites you to receive our exclusive e-mail updates. Start saving right away with your new member exclusive deal - 10% off your next purchase. This amazing discount gives you a glimpse of the savings to come as a Dell subscriber.

item.title: BitDefender 8 Professional Plus
item.description: BitDefender 8 Professional Plus adds spam protection and a firewall to the well-known BitDefender antivirus. But the suite may not have what it takes to compete in the U.S. market.

item.title: Dell Photo All-In-One Printer 942
item.description: The Dell Photo All-In-One Printer 942 offers better speed than most ink jet AIOs, but with output quality that's a touch below par, particularly for photos.

item.title: HP Deskjet 6840 Color Inkjet Printer
item.description: With both Ethernet and 802.11g built in, the HP Deskjet 6840 is fully network ready.

item.title: ViewEra V191D
item.description: It's not perfect, but if you want a big display at a bargain price, the V191D should get your attention.

item.title: IBM ThinkVision L170m
item.description: The IBM ThinkVision L170m has a value price but delivers more than you'd get with a no-name model.

item.title: Workshare 3.5
item.description: With a smooth interface and tight Office 2003 integration that really does speed up collating multiple versions of Word documents, Workshare can fill the bill for any shop that collaborates on business documents via e-mail.

item.title: On iPatch 1.1
item.description: Although larger networks will probably look at more robust solutions, small to medium-size, Microsoft-centric shops will find On iPatch a helpful tool.

item.title: HP iPAQ hx2750 Pocket PC
item.description: The HP iPAQ hx2750 is a fast, handsome business PDA that's a very good choice for anyone who needs top-of-the-line performance or carries sensitive data.
